author: LiBrainian Core Team
agentDescription: Validates against quality standards. Use this when task intent aligns with tags: strategic, quality. Use this construction when an agent task matches quality standards workflows and the team needs a repeatable, typed analysis contract. It cannot replace full runtime verification and does not guarantee correctness outside the provided input and capability constraints.

examples.title: Example 1
examples.description: Run quality-standards for a relevant intent
